channel.title: NEED Help With this logging out code

item.title: NEED Help With this logging out code
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

nvm its not working because co owner is rights 3 witch i need to make owner rights 5 but idk how to make rights 5 have a crown soo im confused[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 03:53:40 pm[/size][hr]please someone help me with thiss cause everytime it instead if saying Owner and Coder jake logged out it says non-member or member jake logged out but all my other staff positons say the correct thing so im confuseddd heres the code again

[code] if(playerRights == 3)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Owner and Coder " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Jake”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Jake " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“King Slayer”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Skillz Pl0x”) || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(""))
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerRights == 2)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Administrator " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerRights == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Modarator " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerIsMember == 0)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Non-Member " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}
else if (playerIsMember == 1)
{
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = “Member " +playerName+ " has logged out”;
}

}[/code]

help me with this pleasee

Read full topic

System.out.printl("Owner jake has logged out!");

[/quote]
Roflz? Si my good friend, that will make it say that Owner Jake has logged out in the command prompt, ;)[/quote]

Was just doing batch work

item.title: NEED Help With this logging out code
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay when i log out i want it to say owner Jake has logged out but it doesnt and i added this ccode in and got no errors but it still doesnt say it

if(playerRights == 3) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "owner " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Jake") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Jake " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Skillz Pl0x") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("King Slayer") || playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("")) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Co-Owner " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerRights == 2) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Admin " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerRights == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Modarator " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerIsMember == 0) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Non-Member " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } else if (playerIsMember == 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = "Member " +playerName+ " has logged out"; } }

so how come it dont say it?

Read full topic
